metadata.title: Oeuvres complettes de Louis de Saint-Simon, duc et pair de France, chevalier des Ordres du roi & c. & c.
metadata.creator: Treuttel, Jean-Georges,1744-1826
Treuttel, Jean-Georges, 1744-1826
Saint-Simon, Louis de Rouvroy, duc de, 1675-1755. Works. 1791
Onfroy, Eugène, d. 1809, bookseller
metadata.publisher: A Strasbourg : Chez Treuttel, libraire, & se trouve à Paris chez Onfroy, rue St. Victor, nro. 11
metadata.description: Prospectus for: Oeuvres complettes de Louis de Saint-Simon. Strasbourg, 1791
"Prix 39 livres brochés, et franc de port en province 45 liv. On en a tiré 25 exemplaires sur papier vélin, prix 84 livres"--P. [1]
Laid in: Letter of transmittal dated "le 18 may 1791" regarding the publication of the proposed edition of Saint-Simon's works, signed in ms.: Onfroy, libraire, rue St Victor, no 11
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination.
